item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Is the world really running out of sand? (290 points | 95 comments)
3. A Local-First Case Study (43 points | 18 comments)
4. COBOL has been "dead" for so long, my grandpa wrote about it (26 points | 6 comments)

26. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (79 points | 177 comments)
